synopsis.text:
Revolution izing the term 'Knocker-Up' from its roots in the Industrial Revolution, the anime "D_Cide Traumerei the Animation" introduces a new breed of heroes in the bustling city of Shibuya. Ryuuhei Oda, once a young boy who witnessed the enigmatic death of his beloved older brother, has now blossomed into a spirited high school student with a passion for kickboxing. Despite the haunting memories of his past, Ryuuhei's resilience shines through his cheerful demeanor and unwavering sense of justice.

One fateful day, Ryuuhei's life takes a dramatic turn when he encounters a peculiar creature named Tris during a kickboxing session. The creature bites him, causing Ryuuhei to experience a series of bizarre dreams. As the rumored 'Drops' spread chaos throughout the city, Ryuuhei finds himself confronted by eerie creatures from the dreamscape.

Jessica Clayborn and Aruto Fushibe, two seasoned Knocker-Ups, come to Ryuuhei's aid, revealing that he has been chosen to join their ranks. With his kickboxing skills and newfound powers, Ryuuhei must now navigate the precarious boundary between reality and the dream world. As he battles the nightmarish forces threatening Shibuya, Ryuuhei uncovers a chilling connection between the mysterious mark left near his brother's body and the sinister forces he now faces.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
